Classes in com.twitter.common.quantity with type parameters of type Unit
 class Amount<T extends Number & Comparable<T>,U extends Unit<U>>
          Represents a value in a unit system and facilitates unambiguous communication of amounts.
 interface Unit<U extends Unit<U>>
          Represents a unit hierarchy for a given unit of measure; eg: time.
